message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $200. It's an exceptional value considering its quality and the benefits it provides. I believe this price reflects its true worth and offers you a great opportunity to experience its excellence.
I appreciate the offer, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $150. This price reflects a fair compromise while still ensuring a reasonable profit for us. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.

I appreciate the compromise, but $150 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'd like to make a counteroffer of $125. I'm really interested in the product and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
